title: Access & Roles Management
description: Configure user roles, permissions, and data visibility rules for secure access control
overview: The Access & Roles module is the security control center for Project Beacon. Here you define who can access what data, which modules they can use, and how data visibility is determined by organizational hierarchy. Proper configuration is critical for data security and compliance.

keyFeatures.title: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
keyFeatures.description: Define roles with specific permission sets that determine module access and actions

keyFeatures.title: Data Scope Management
keyFeatures.description: Control data visibility using 'Own Cases', 'Team Cases', or 'All Cases' scopes

keyFeatures.title: Module Access Control
keyFeatures.description: Restrict access to specific modules based on role assignments

keyFeatures.title: Team Hierarchy
keyFeatures.description: Define reporting relationships that affect team-level data visibility

keyFeatures.title: Permission Inheritance
keyFeatures.description: Roles inherit permissions from parent roles in the hierarchy

keyFeatures.title: Audit Trail
keyFeatures.description: Track all permission changes and access events for compliance

roles.title: Roles
roles.description: View and manage system roles with their associated permissions
roles.whenToUse: When creating new roles, modifying existing role permissions, or reviewing role definitions

users.title: Users
users.description: Manage user accounts and their role assignments
users.whenToUse: When assigning roles to users, reviewing user access levels, or troubleshooting access issues

permissions.title: Permissions
permissions.description: Fine-grained control over individual actions within modules
permissions.whenToUse: When customizing what actions are allowed for specific roles beyond standard presets

data-scope.title: Data Scope
data-scope.description: Configure visibility rules for case and client data
data-scope.whenToUse: When setting up data visibility policies based on organizational hierarchy

audit.title: Audit Log
audit.description: Review access-related events and permission changes
audit.whenToUse: For compliance audits, security reviews, or investigating access issues

createRole.title: Create Role
createRole.description: Define a new role with custom permissions

assignRole.title: Assign Role
assignRole.description: Assign a role to one or more users

cloneRole.title: Clone Role
cloneRole.description: Create a copy of an existing role for modification
cloneRole.action: Creates duplicate role with editable permissions

viewPermissionMatrix.title: Permission Matrix
viewPermissionMatrix.description: See all permissions across all roles in a grid view

quickStart.description: Examine the pre-configured roles (Admin, Partner/CA, Manager, Advocate, Staff) and their permissions

quickStart.title: Understand Data Scopes

quickStart.title: Configure Module Access
quickStart.description: For each role, select which modules should be visible in the sidebar

quickStart.title: Set Up Team Hierarchy
quickStart.description: Define who reports to whom in Employee Master to enable 'Team Cases' visibility

quickStart.title: Test Access Levels
quickStart.description: Log in as different roles to verify the access configuration works as expected
